thread.title: DisneyLife is the new Netflix competitor for all things Disney
thread.title_full: DisneyLife is the new Netflix competitor for all things Disney

title: DisneyLife is the new Netflix competitor for all things Disney
text:
DisneyLife is the new Netflix competitor for all things Disney 
Irish Examiner Friday 23rd October, 2015 
There’s another big player joining the streaming service game, and it’s one the kids might be quite excited about; Disney. 
The movie-making giant is launching the DisneyLife service in the UK in November, with the monthly fee of ?9.99 getting users access to Disney and Disney-Pixar movies, as well as TV shows, albums and books. Short term offline downloads will also be available via the new mobile service. 
...
